div.div: District 39 buildings will remain closed and remote learning will continue for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Please visit our Remote Learning Page for additional information or visit our Support Portal for technology support.

a.title: Harper third grader helps sibling with homework

img.alt: Harper third grader helps sibling with homework

a.title: Central second grader writes letter for healthcare workers.jpg

img.alt: Central second grader writes letter for healthcare workers.jpg

div.p: District 39’s mission is to nurture, guide, and challenge students to become creative thinkers, collaborators, and responsible, compassionate, and productive citizens of a global society. The Statement of Inclusion articulates our commitment to a safe and equitable learning environment that fosters a mindset of empathy, respect, and belonging.

div.div: Meeting Information Board of Education Meeting April 27, 2020 agenda | video

h3.style: font-family: latoregular, sans-ferif; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(20, 31, 62); padding: 5px; border-top-width: 8px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.div: As of April 27, 2020, parents must only report attendance if their child is unable to participate in remote learning.

a.title: SY19-20 Adjustments and Remote Learning Updates

div.a: SY19-20 Adjustments and Remote Learning Updates
div.div: Dr. Cremascoli gives an update to the community on adjustments made to District 39 programming.
Mr. Corey Bultemeier will bring continued integrity and transparency to District 39 business operations beginning next school year.
Per Gov. Pritzker's order, all Illinois public and private schools will continue remote learning for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
In a message to families, Dr. Cremascoli shares the April Remote Learning Calendar and reviews feedback collected through stakeholder surveys.

h3.style: margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(20, 31, 62); padding: 5px; border-top: 8px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: latoregular, sans-ferif;

div.p:
Remote Learning in D39
All the information you need to know about Remote Learning in District 39 has been posted in one page for your convenience. Check out our new Remote Learning Page for the latest schedule, resources and information on remote learning.

p.span:
The newly-created Giving and Support Page contains resources for families looking to receive or provide support as a result of recent school/business closures.
COVID-19 Parent Information
Stay up to date on the latest school news and alerts through our new Coronavirus Updates Page.
